name: Sanctifica
description: '''Sanctifica''' was a Swedish [[unblack metal]] band, formed in 1996, and disbanded in 2003. After releasing their EP, ''In the Bleak Midwinter'', in 1997, they were considered to be one of the leading modern [[Christian black metal]] bands in the early 2000s with their album ''[[Spirit of Purity]]''. Signed to Swedish [[Christian Rivel|Rivel Records]] and Finnish [[Deuteronomium (band)#Little Rose Productions|Little Rose Productions]], the band played [[progressive death metal]] on their second and last album ''[[Negative B]]''. They did a tour through Scandinavia to support that album, performing at some of the best known rock clubs in big cities. Hubertus Liljegren went to join [[Crimson Moonlight]], while the rest formed a rock group called As a Reminder.
